Description_lang: Efflorescence removes all snare effects from friendly targets when it heals and its Mana cost is reduced by $s2%.

description_blz.en_US: Efflorescence removes all snare effects from friendly targets when it heals and its Mana cost is reduced by 40%.
description_blz.es_MX: Floración elimina todos los efectos de frenado de los objetivos amistosos al sanarlos y se reduce un 40% su costo de maná.
description_blz.pt_BR: Eflorescência remove todos os efeitos de lerdeza dos alvos aliados ao curar e tem o custo de mana reduzido em 40%.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Erblühen' entfernt bei seiner Heilung alle bewegungseinschränkenden Effekte von verbündeten Zielen und die Manakosten der Fähigkeit sind um 40% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Efflorescence removes all snare effects from friendly targets when it heals and its Mana cost is reduced by 40%.
description_blz.es_ES: Al curar, Floración elimina todos los efectos de frenado de los objetivos amistosos, y su coste de maná se reduce un 40%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Efflorescence dissipe les effets de ralentissement qui affectent les cibles alliées en soignant et son coût en mana est réduit de 40 %.
description_blz.it_IT: Efflorescenza dissolve tutti gli effetti di rallentamento dai bersagli alleati che cura. Inoltre, il suo costo in mana è ridotto del 40%.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Период цветения" снимает с исцеленных целей эффекты замедления и стоит на 40% меньше маны.
description_blz.ko_KR: 꽃피우기가 치유할 때 아군 대상에게 걸린 모든 감속 효과를 제거합니다. 또한 마나 소모량이 40%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 生命綻放為友方目標治療時，同時移除所有緩速效果，且其法力消耗降低40%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 百花齐放进行治疗时，还会移除友方目标身上所有的诱捕效果，并且法力值消耗降低40%。
